extendedInfo.description: Pray along with audio recitations of the Rosary and Divine Mercy Chaplet, make the Stations of the Cross, and hear many audio talks about prayer, meditations on the Rosary and the Passion of Christ, and a history of devotions such as the Rosary.   Download the app for free and sample some of the talks. Upgrade to the full version to have unlimited access to the complete library.These MP3's are streamed to your Android device, not downloaded, so they take up no storage space.  A connection is required for the MP3 to play properly.If you have already purchased the full library on another Android device, you can unlock it again by downloading the free version, selecting the "Upgrade" button, and going through the purchase process again. You will not be charged again. HAVING PROBLEMS?** Try uninstalling and reinstall the free app, then upgrade again. Any time you reinstall an app you purchased,you have to go through the upgrade process again.  You will not actually be charged again **** New device? Same as the above directions for reinstalling. **** Google Plays won't let you reinstall saying "you already own it"?  This is a bug they are working on but have not fixed yet.  We have a work around in the meantime.  Please email us at catholicvault@gmail.com to request instructions. **

reviews.title: Poor horrible app
reviews.comment: This app distracts you from praying the rosary. The music is loud you could barely hear the prayer. And the music choice doesn\'t help you meditate while praying. In fact it makes you not pray at all. The people praying are rushing to pray and seems like they just want to get it over with. This is not how to pray. There is no sincerity. I can feel it. I couldn\'t finish the rosary using this app. I wanted something to help me pray. I am better off reciting the prayer alone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but could be better.
reviews.comment: I love the content, but the audio quality is poor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice...but
reviews.comment: A good app...but could the  Rosary recitations NOT have the music so loud!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: they do not give you credit when you pay for the app  when you try to redownload thay try to make you pay for it again  furthermore I thought they said it was free

reviews.title: Mark Rollback
reviews.comment: It\'s fabulous!!! Thank You. Wish people would stop complaining and give you the credit you deserve for helping us with a spiritual tool in the midst of the insanity in which we live
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Examining my conscience
reviews.comment: Thanks very much love. This app is bringing me back to God\'s ways.

reviews.comment: Hi love saying the rosary but background music is awful and distracting and will uninstall because of this.

reviews.comment: Only regret is u only get the joyful meditations unless u buy full version. U get divine mercy n other great stuff too. Definitely worth download
